message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $110
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still only able to go up to $90. If that doesn't work for you, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $90, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer you the product for $105
